description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Caloundra, Australia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Fun-Filled Sunshine Coast Escape with Waterpark & Mini-Golf Course
hotels.description: The whole family or a group of friends can enjoy an escape brimming with extra-special, fun in the sun moments when staying at Oaks Sunshine Coast Oasis Resort. Incredible facilities include an exciting onsite waterpark, large outdoor swimming pool, mini-golf golf course, sandpit, climbing frame and giant Kangaroo Jumper - there's something for all ages. The Oak & Vine Sunshine Coast restaurant is a popular eatery for Caloundra locals or visitors and is perfect for a tasty meal along the waterfront or a glass of wine on the deck.

seo.title: Hotel a Caloundra - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Caloundra, Australia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
